# Devcontainer Setup Instructions

This repository supports development using [Visual Studio Code Dev Containers](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/remote/containers).

## Getting Started

1. Ensure you have [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) and [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) installed.
2. Install the [Remote - Containers extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode-remote.remote-containers) for VS Code.
3. Open the repository in VS Code.
4. When prompted, reopen the folder in the container.

## Customizing the Devcontainer

- Edit the `.devcontainer/devcontainer.json` file to customize the environment.
- Add any required dependencies to the Dockerfile or devcontainer configuration.

## Troubleshooting

- If you encounter issues, refer to the [Dev Containers documentation](https://containers.dev/).

---

_Replace this template with specific instructions for your project as needed._
